rotate_knob_start_machine.description: Rotate the knob to start the brewing process.

rotate_knob.description: Rotate the knob to set the desired options on the coffee machine.

fill_container.description: Pick up the coffee container and fill it.

empty_container.description: Pick up the filled coffee container to empty it.

place_lid.description: Place the coffee machine lid back in its place.

clean_entire_machine.description: Complete cleaning of the coffee machine including knob, container, lid, and body.

prepare_machine.description: Prepare the coffee machine for use by picking up the lid and placing the container.
